author: Emily Heller
title: CBS All Access offers a free one-month subscription, according to Patrick Stewart
description: Amid coronavirus concerns, CBS is offering a free 30-day trial of its streaming service with the promo code GIFT. Patrick Stewart, star of CBS All Access show Star Trek: Picard, announced the new deal on Twitter.
content: Sir Patrick Stewart took to Twitter on Tuesday to announce that CBS is offering a free monthlong trial of its subscription service, CBS All Access. Stewart is currently reprising his role as Captain Jean-Luc Picard on the CBS All Access show Star Trek: Picard… [+1229 chars]
